ObjectDetectionYoloRKNN.Name: Object Detection (YOLOv5 RKNN)
ObjectDetectionYoloRKNN.Description: Provides Object Detection using YOLOv5 RKNN models. This module only works with Rockchip RK3588/RK3588S NPUs like the Orange Pi 5/5B/5 Plus
ObjectDetectionYoloRKNN.Author: Mike Lud

ModuleReleases.ReleaseNotes: Updates to help Blue Iris users
Updated to match new installer SDK.
Updated to match new installer SDK.

RouteMaps.Name: Object Detector
RouteMaps.Description: Detects multiple objects in an image.

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.3.

Outputs.Name: message
Outputs.Description: A summary of the inference operation.

Outputs.Name: error
Outputs.Description: (Optional) An description of the error if success was false.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

RouteMaps.Name: Custom Object Detector RKNN
RouteMaps.Description: Detects objects based on YOLO PyTorch models. Models are stored as .rknn files in the /ObjectDetectionYoloRKNN/custom-models directory, and to make a call to a specific model use /vision/custom/model-name, where 'model-name' is the name of the model's .rknn file

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: message
Outputs.Description: A summary of the inference operation.

Outputs.Name: error
Outputs.Description: (Optional) An description of the error if success was false.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

RouteMaps.Name: Object Detector List Custom Models (RKNN)
RouteMaps.Description: Returns a list of models available.

Outputs.Name: models
Outputs.Description: An array of strings containing the names of the models installed.
